value:
Life can be painful. Miserable even.
But I'll never cry. Because if I were to
cry, he would cry...

Everywhere I go, adults claw at each
other's throats over things so petty
even a child would lose interest.

Oh, I almost forgot. I have good news,
and then I have even better news. So,
which would you like to hear first?

This aroma... We must be having
herbed stew tonight! I'm sure the
chief will turn up before long...$k$pHerbed stew is his favorite, after all.

Oh! Have you been watching long?
While warriors swing their steel, we
dancers train the swing of our hips.

I come bearing a gift of dance from
your friend $Nf.
My form is perfect today!

Phew! That much dancing isn't as
easy as it looks!
I can't believe this! How awful.

At this rate, I'm wondering if I might
grow even stronger than Chief Gerik...

I'm Tethys, a member of Gerik's band
of mercenaries. I'll liven things up in a
way rarely seen outside Jehanna!

You've taken me in, so you deserve
to know more about my past...$k$pEwan and I were...abandoned by
our parents. Every day was a new
struggle for survival.$k$pAfter watching and imitating what
I saw, I found a way to survive: dance.
My body is my life...and my weapon.$k$pIt was all thanks to my dancing that
I was able to fall in with the chief's
crew...and yours. So make use of it!$k$pBattles are decided by more than
blades. Though...I'm good for more
than just dancing too.$k$pIf you'd ever like to chat, I'd be
happy to lend an ear anytime.
ほら
ダメよ
きゃっ
負けたわ…
Now's not the time.
Behave yourself.
Don't be so sure.
Enough trouble from you!
The dark rider...is coming...
Hee hee!
You watching?
Here—this'll help!
If we do our best, good things will come of it—and then...even better things after that!
When Ewan is smiling, I'm happy—so I want him to smile all the time! I'm his big sister, after all.
You wanna know what made me the woman I am today? Hard work, of course!
There's a rumor that, in our little band of mercenaries, there are two women enamored with the commander... I wonder who...
I've been working on a new dance, so let me know if you need a morale boost!
Of course!
I'll think about it.
Lead away!
